introBlock.title: Hello World!
introBlock.intro:
I am Lenin Hasda, a life long learner, passionate programmer, hobbyist drawer sketch artist, hacker (sometimes) and a maker.

Professionally I'm a Full Stack Software Engineer based in Dhaka, Bangladesh, having 4+ years experience in LEMP / LAMP stack and about 1 year in MEAN stack.
Besides development, I have decent amount of experience with Database and various Server Administration like: Digital Ocean, AWS EC2, VPS Server etc.
